parts.text:
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF code (Cod MFC 3324005), indicating it's likely electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post clearly refers to András István Demeter, a parliamentary candidate for UDMR (Uniunea Democrată Maghiară din România), by name and party affiliation.  It also specifies his position on the ballot (4).</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, it's designed to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. The use of hashtags further suggests an attempt to broaden reach.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's primary objective is to encourage voters to choose András István Demeter. Phrases like "Alege vocea ratiunii!" (Choose the voice of reason!), "România pe primul loc!" (Romania in first place!), and the prominent display of his ballot position strongly suggest an intention to influence voting behavior.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The content is not journalistic in nature. It lacks objective reporting or analysis. Instead, it promotes a specific candidate with persuasive language and imagery.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; it's a clear campaign advertisement.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1335064637876078</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It directly refers to a candidate (András István Demeter), is used during the electoral campaign period (although the end date is specified, it's unclear if this is after the official end of the campaign), has a clear electoral objective (to increase votes for Demeter), and goes beyond simple journalistic reporting. The presence of a CMF code further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's paid nature and wide reach on Facebook solidify its intent as electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>András István Demeter</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>UDMR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
RMDSZ/UDMR, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea postării cu ID-ul 1335064637876078 pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidatul András István Demeter pentru alegerile parlamentare,  utilizând imagini și texte persuasive menite să influențeze votul alegătorilor. Postarea, cu un buget de sub 100 RON, a atins peste 1 milion de utilizatori, conține codul CMF 3324005 și indică poziția 4 a candidatului pe buletinul de vot.  Textul "Alege vocea ratiunii! România pe primul loc!" și prezentarea vizuală a candidatului sunt elemente clare de propagandă electorală, interzise după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.  Informațiile de contact ale advertiserului sunt disponibile în Ad Library: demeterandras@rmdsz.ro și +40745600964.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
